member.name: F:DlibDotNet.NativeMethods.NativeLibrary
member.summary: Native library file name. If Linux, it will be converted to libDlibDotNetNative.so If MacOSX, it will be converted to libDlibDotNetNative.dylib If Windows, it will be available after call LoadLibrary. And this file name must not contain period. If it does, CLR does not add extension (.dll) and CLR fails to load library

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Gets the type of real numbers.

member.summary: Gets the number of points given to this object so far.

member.summary: Gets the unbiased sample kurtosis of all the values presented to this object so far.

member.summary: Gets the largest value presented to this object so far.

member.name: P:DlibDotNet.RunningStats`1.Mean
member.summary: Gets the mean of all the values presented to this object so far.

member.name: P:DlibDotNet.RunningStats`1.Min
member.summary: Gets the smallest value presented to this object so far.

member.name: P:DlibDotNet.RunningStats`1.Skewness
member.summary: Gets the unbiased sample skewness of all the values presented to this object so far.

member.summary: Gets the unbiased sampled standard deviation of all the values presented to this object so far.

member.name: P:DlibDotNet.RunningStats`1.Variance
member.summary: Gets the unbiased sample variance of all the values presented to this object so far.

member.summary: Clears all points given to this object so far.
